title: Irrigation Systems | Crop Production & Management| Middle School Science | Khan Academy

tasks.task: Understanding the importance of irrigation in agriculture
subtasks: Recognize the essential role of water in plant survival
Identify factors determining the right time and amount of irrigation
Understand the sources of irrigation water (groundwater, surface water, non-conventional sources)
Compare traditional and modern irrigation methods (pulley system, chain pump, liver system, furrow irrigation vs. sprinkler and drip systems)

tasks.task: Evaluating the evolution of irrigation techniques
subtasks: Assess the efficiency and sustainability of traditional vs. modern irrigation methods
Understand the role of motorized pumps in modern irrigation systems
Recognize the impact of environmental factors (crop type, soil, season) on irrigation needs
